title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex
My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited… and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder brother." "Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent’s remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent’s feelings, decided on a ‘sibling rule’ where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?  

---

- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

description.en: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

title.en: Global Ghosts Warden: I have 100 million Contracted Ghosts

altTitles.zh: 全球御鬼：我的体内有亿只鬼

description.en: Lin Mo, who plays games during class, has crossed over to a parallel world infested with ghosts and monsters. As the one with the worst talent, he unexpectedly gains the Breakthrough System. All he needs to do is break a ghost’s defense to forcefully contract it. Now, things have taken an incredible turn. While others typically contract two ghosts on average, Lin Mo has contracted billions. With a single summon, a myriad of ghosts descends! Drowning ghosts, starving ghosts, alcoholic ghosts, chainsaw ghosts…
description.zh: 上课打游戏的林墨，穿越到了鬼怪横行的平行世界。作为天赋最差的他，意外获得破防系统。只要让鬼破防就可强行契约。这下了不得了，别人平均契约两只鬼，林墨直接契约了亿只。一声召唤，万鬼降临！溺死鬼，饿死鬼，酒鬼，电锯鬼……

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn't make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl. Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her "The class's second cutest girl" behind her back. On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, "the cutest girl in class's" invitation just to hang out in my house with me. Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.ja:
「じゃあ、内緒の友達ってことで――」

クラスでぼっちな俺・前原真樹に、初めてできた友だち・朝凪海。いつも輪の中心にいて、他の男子からは『クラスで２番目に可愛い』なんて陰で噂されている。ぼっちの俺なんかと住む世界が違う――と思いきや、まさかのＢ級映画好き!? ひょんなことから友だちになった朝凪さんは、金曜日の放課後だけこっそり俺の家に遊びに来る。映画にゲーム、漫画の趣味も合う彼女との楽しいひととき。
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

description.en: This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.
description.it: Kobeni Yonomori è una studentessa liceale che una volta diventata sedicenne, scopre di essere già fidanzata con un ragazzo di nome Hakuya Mitsumine per via di un accordo fatto dal suo nonno defunto. Costui da questo momento in poi si stabilirà a casa sua insieme alla sorellina Mashiro, e Kobeni, seppur riluttante, dovrà dunque cercare di adattarsi alla sua nuova vita familiare, finora ristretta solo a sua madre Akane e a sua sorella Benio. Ben presto, però, la ragazza si renderà conto che Hakuya e Mashiro sono ben più di ciò che sembrano.
description.ko: 요노모리 코베니는 이혼한 후 일 때문에 바쁜 어머니 요노모리 아카네를 대신하여 집안일을 담당하면서 언니 요노모리 베니오와 함께 3명이서 평범하게 생활하고 있었지만, 16세 생일을 맞이하던 날, 약혼자라고 주장하는 소년 미츠미네 하쿠야와 그의 여동생 미츠미네 마시로와 만나, 집에서 함께 생활하게 된다.
description.ru: Кобэни Ёномори, симпатичная девушка и отличная хозяйка, получила на 16-й день рождения самый необычный подарок. Мать объявила, что по слову покойного деда, главы клана, Кобэни с детства помолвлена с наследником семьи Мицуминэ, своим ровесником по имени Хакуя. Сам суженый знатного рода, но вырос в горной деревне, и, чтобы обрести городской шик и приобщиться к цивилизации, отныне будет жить с ними – а вот, кстати, и он. Окончательно добило Ёномори-младшую явление вихря энергии в виде малышки Масиро Мицуминэ, которая с порога заявила, что не отдаст братика абы кому и быстро научит невестку жить по закону гор! Впрочем, все вышло не так уж плохо. Малолетняя «золовка», поняв, что брату досталась вовсе не белоручка, быстро подобрела, а Бэнио, старшая из сестер Ёномори, ненавязчиво показала гостье, кто в доме хозяйка, да так, что бедная Масиро стала прятаться от будущей «сватьи». Ну а Хакуя оказался, словно самурай иной эпохи – загадочный, невозмутимый, не тратящий слов зря, но говорящий только по делу. Из обрывков фраз и прочих намеков Кобэни поняла, что помолвка возникла не на пустом месте, и их с Хакуей связывает давняя история. А раз так, незачем спешить - надо разобраться в себе и дать парню шанс. Не зря говорят – браки по расчету всегда удачны, если расчет был хороший!
description.vi: Đại khái phần manga của anime cùng tên, thánh nào chưa coi thì xin mời nhé. Cơ bản là em hàng Kobeni Yonomori đến 16 tuổi thì tự nhiên boy lạnh lùng Hakuya Mitsumine cùng em gái Mashiro xuất hiện. Rồi té ra boy đó là hôn thê, còn con em là em rể.
description.es-la: Kobeni Yonomori es una chica de secundaria que vive con su madre y su hermana mayor Benio. Al cumplir los 16 años Kobeni se sorprende al enterarse de que debido a un acuerdo hecho por su difunto abuelo ella está comprometida con un chico llamado Hakuya Mitsumine quien, junto con su hermana pequeña Mashiro, van a vivir con ella. A medida que Kobeni se va adaptando a esta nueva familia, descubre de que Hakuya y Mashiro son más de lo que aparentaban.
description.pt-br: Este é um mangá de comédia de quatro painéis sobre Kobeni Yonomori, que em seu aniversário de 16 anos, de repente, tem um jovem com pouca presença chamado Hakuya Mitsumine e sua irmãzinha Mashiro aparecem na frente dela. Acontece que Hakuya é seu noivo, e Mashiro é sua futura cunhada. Os três (e a irmã mais velha de Kobeni, Benio) começam a viver juntos sob o mesmo teto, e acontecem acontecimentos hilários.
description.zh-hk: 過著普通生活的高中女生——夜之森小紅，在迎接16歲生日時，從媽媽口中得知了一件驚人的禮物。與小紅有著婚約的少年——三峰白夜與其妹妹三峰真白將要一起住在同個屋簷下，三人與小紅的姊姊——夜之森紅緒之間的奇妙同居生活就此揭開序幕。

description.en: Toono Ao failed to get into college and became a ronin, studying for next years exams instead. To better study for them, Ao moved out to live on his own into an apartment near his cram school. It's not much, but it's a place to call his own. But not long after moving in, a drunken lady finds her way into his new home! It doesn't matter how hard he tries, she just continues to make herself at home and take advantage of him. This is not okay!… Or is it? His humble castle is no longer his own. Onee-san is invading!
description.ja:
夢にまで見た上京一人暮らし。狭いけど駅近物件。そんな僕の大事なお城は見知らぬおねーさんに侵略を許した！変わる壁紙、開発されるカラダ・・これって大歓迎案件？
 
--- 
 
Yume ni made mita jōkyō hitorigurashi. Semaikedo eki kin bukken. Son'na boku no daijina o-jō wa mishiranu o ne ̄-san ni shinryaku o yurushita! Kawaru kabegami, kaihatsu sa reru Karada kore tte dai kangei anken?
description.zh: 透野青没能考上大学，成了一名浪人，转而准备明年的考试。为了更好地复习，他搬到了补习学校附近的公寓里独自生活。虽然房子不大，但也算得上是自己的家了，可刚搬进去没多久，一个喝醉酒的女人就强行闯进了他的新家！不管他怎么努力，她就是继续把他当成自己的家，占他的便宜。这可不行！......还是不行？他简陋的城堡不再属于他了一姐姐正在入侵中！
description.es-la: Toono Ao no consiguió entrar en la universidad y se convirtió en ronin, y continúa estudiando para los exámenes del año siguiente. Para estudiar mejor, Ao se mudó a vivir por su cuenta a un apartamento cerca de su escuela de reforzamiento. No es mucho, pero es un lugar al que puede llamar suyo. Pero al poco tiempo de mudarse, una dama borracha se abre paso en su nuevo hogar. No importa lo mucho que él lo intente, ella sigue sintiéndose como en casa y aprovechándose de él. ¡Esto no está bien! ...¿O no? Su humilde castillo ya no es suyo. ¡Onee-san está invadiendo!

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people.
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

title.en: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani o Negau - Highserk Senki

altTitles.ja: 濁る瞳で何を願う ハイセルク戦記
Nigoru Hitomi de Nani wo Negau - Highserk Senki

altTitles.en: What Do You Wish For With Those Murky Eyes: Record of Highserk War
What Do You Wish For With Muddy Eyes: Record of Highserk War

altTitles.ru: Чего ты желаешь своим мутным взором?

altTitles.id: Apa yang Kau inginkan dengan mata berlumpur?

description.en:
One day, Raizou ​​Takakura, an average salaryman, had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But, he got a second life in a different world.

Reincarnated with strong skills― wasn't what happened to him. Instead, he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country, Highserk Empire, which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name, Walm, he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death, along his comrades, he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.

An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic, transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them, Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time.
___
**Character Designer:** [So-taro](https://mangadex.org/author/c4ae5d7f-3399-4b1f-a509-d7388ad47826)
description.id:
Suatu hari, Raizou Takakura, seorang pegawai biasa, mengalami serangan jantung dan hidupnya berakhir hari itu. Tapi, dia mendapat kehidupan kedua di dunia yang berbeda.

Reinkarnasi dengan keterampilan yang kuat― tidak terjadi padanya, sebaliknya, dia bereinkarnasi sebagai prajurit di sebuah negara kecil, Kekaisaran Highserk, yang dikelilingi oleh negara-negara besar. Dengan nama baru, Walm, dia terlempar ke garis depan perang. Berlumuran darah dan bau kematian, bersama rekan-rekannya, dia tergelincir melalui situasi hidup atau mati.

Sebuah party petualang dengan anggota yang bisa menggunakan sihir yang kuat, penerima transfer dengan kekuatan luar biasa yang disebut "pahlawan."

Dalam pertempuran mematikan dengan mereka, Walm secara bertahap mengembangkan bakatnya sebagai seorang pejuang yang tidak akan pernah terbangun jika dia tinggal di masa damai. Sementara matanya menjadi gelap dan berlumpur seiring waktu―
description.ja:
平凡な会社員だった高倉頼蔵（たかくら　らいぞう）は、ある日、心筋梗塞によりその生涯を閉じた。
しかし、彼は異世界で第二の生を得る。


[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6680gq)  (jp)
description.ru:
Однажды у обычного офисного работника Райдзу Такакуры случился сердечный приступ, и в тот же день его жизнь оборвалась. Но мир одарил его новой жизнью в другом мире.

Он реинкарнировался не с сильными способностями, а просто перевоплотился в пехотинца из маленькой страны, империи Хайсерк, которая окружена большими государствами. С новым именем, Вальм, он был брошен на фронт войны. Покрытый кровью и смрадом смерти, вместе со своими товарищами он пробирался через ситуации жизни и смерти.

В смертельной схватке с ними Вальм постепенно развил свой талант воина, который никогда бы не пробудился, останься он в мирном городе. Но за все схватки его глаза со временем потемнели и помутнели...

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There’s just one problem. He’s made the Defense Force’s neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.ja: 便利屋斎藤さん、異世界に行く

altTitles.zh: 万事屋斋藤先生转生异世界

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬事屋齋藤先生轉生異世界

altTitles.ar: العامل الماهر سايتو في عالم آخر

altTitles.fr: Saitou, l'homme à tout faire dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: Saitou, um faz-tudo em outro mundo

altTitles.ru: Мастер на все руки Сайто в другом мире

altTitles.es: El útil señor Saitou en otro mundo
El utilero Saitou en otro mundo

altTitles.vi: Anh Thợ Saitou Đa Năng Ở Dị Giới

description.en: Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life, he’s had average grades, ordinary athletic skill, a commonplace job… But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here, warriors, wizards, and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons, and Saitou realizes for the first time what it’s like to be needed. After all, who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies’ equipment? Beginning with a simple “thank you,” this is the story of an ordinary person’s fulfilling life.
description.es: Saitou es un utilero ordinario que se transporta a otro mundo donde sus habilidades son muy útiles. Empieza a entender realmente lo que significa ser necesario, ya que incluso sus tareas y herramientas mundanas tienen los usos más inesperados en este nuevo mundo de fantasía!
description.ja:
斎藤さんは充実していた。この世界で「ありがとう」を知ったから。今までの人生、ずっと平々凡々と生きてきた。運動も、勉強も、そこそこ。決して一番になれない普通の人間……それが、斎藤さん。

職業“便利屋”の斎藤さんは、ある日、異世界に転生する。そこで出会ったのは、強く美しいツンデレ戦士。ラエルザ呪文を忘れる最強魔法使い。で、エロじじいの　モーロック姿はかわいいが守銭奴の妖精。ラファンパン斎藤さんは個性的すぎる仲間たちとダンジョン攻略に挑む。鍵開けのノウハウで、宝箱を開けたりカバン修理のスキルで、仲間の防具を直したり元の世界で身につけた“便利屋”の経験を異世界で活かす。
description.ru:
Сайто — мастер на все руки, который попадает в другой мир, где его навыки невероятно полезны. Погружаясь в новую среду, он начинает понимать истинное значение незаменимости.
Мастер на все руки Сайто никогда не был особенным. Всю жизнь у него были средние оценки, обычные спортивные навыки, заурядная работа... Но его ничем не примечательная жизнь меняется, когда он просыпается в другом мире. Здесь воины, волшебники и эльфы сопровождают его в заданиях, углубляясь в подземелья, и Сайто впервые осознает, что значит быть нужным. Ведь кому, как не мастеру на все руки, можно доверить открытие запертых сундуков с сокровищами или ремонт снаряжения союзников? История обычного человека, начавшаяся с простого «спасибо», — это история его полноценной жизни.
description.vi: Saitou là một người siêng năng bình thường được chuyển đến một thế giới khác, nơi các kỹ năng của anh ta rất hữu ích. Anh ấy bắt đầu thực sự hiểu ý nghĩa của việc được cần đến.
description.pt-br: Saitou é um faz-tudo comum que é transportado para outro mundo onde suas habilidades são muito úteis. Ele começa realmente a entender o que significa ser necessário.

description.en:
Update : 18-September-2023

---

Part 2 Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/111246570)

Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
description.ru:
Сакамото Рёта — 22-летний безработный, игрок мирового уровня в популярную командную боевку «Btooom!». То, что он при этом сидит на шее у матери, парня не волнует, мыслями он всецело в виртуальном мире, где крут, беспощаден и неотразим. Только в наше время до виртуальной реальности далеко — в этом Рёта убедился на своей шкуре, очнувшись в джунглях, крепко избитый, с чужой сумкой и полным сумбуром в голове. В общем, вышло так, что чья-то злая воля закинула на необитаемый остров несколько десятков игроков и предложила им сразиться в «Btooom!» вживую и по-крупному. Без оружия, без доспехов — только ручные бомбы, собственные тела и гражданская одежда. Как говорится — естественный отбор!  
  
Но истинного игрока королевской битвой смутить сложно, особенно когда на кону собственная жизнь. Так что вскоре Рёта отбросил интеллигентские сопли и приготовился, как не столь далекие предки, жить по принципу «или ты, или тебя». Главное — выжить, а там уже можно пофилософствовать о смысле бытия и вдоволь поспорить с сердечной подругой Химико — за что им досталась такая участь? Как говорят: не согрешишь — не покаешься, не покаешься — не спасешься. А еще на острове можно повидать новые места, насладиться прекрасной природой, встретить много интересных людей… и убить их!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/BTOOOM_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/JokeRJUN)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.btooom.com/)

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.fr:
Emma, Norman et Ray coulent des jours heureux à l’orphelinat Grace Field House. Entourés de leurs petits frères et sœurs, ils s’épanouissent sous l’attention pleine de tendresse de « Maman », qu'ils considèrent comme leur véritable mère. Mais tout bascule le soir où ils découvrent l’abominable réalité qui se cache derrière la façade de leur vie paisible ! Ils doivent s’échapper, c’est une question de vie ou de mort !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

altTitles.ja: ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ja: 魔術協会の総本山「時計塔」においてロードに叙されているエルメロイII世は、義妹のライネスから依頼を受け「剥離城アドラ」の遺産相続に立ち会うことに。弟子のグレイを伴い訪れた城で、悲愴な事件が始まる。
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

altTitles.ja: ソードガイ 装刀凱

description.en:
A woman dies a suspicious death in the forest. Her tragic child, Gai, is adopted by Amon, a master swordsmith. More than ten years later, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice, but loses his right arm in an accident while making a sword. Amon crushes the magical sword "Death Dragon" and rebuilds it as an artificial arm for Gai, but...?
A young boy accepts a cruel fate in a whirlwind of battles. Is it darkness that lies ahead for him, or...?

altTitles.en: A Phoenix on the Ninth Floor of Heaven

description.en: Feng Ming is on his way to school when he saves a child about to die, losing his own life in the process. He is given the chance to cross time and space to have a new life and awakens in the body of the crown prince of Xi Lei. This crown prince, however, does not have the high status that Feng Ming expects. Instead, the prince regent Rong Tian holds the highest power in Xi Lei. Rong Tian notices the crown prince’s sudden change in demeanor along with Feng Ming’s habit of suddenly blurting out modern words and phrases, and becomes interested in him...
description.fr: Feng Ming se rend à l'école lorsqu'il sauve un enfant sur le point de mourir, perdant ainsi la vie. Il a la possibilité de traverser le temps et l'espace pour avoir une nouvelle vie et se réveille dans le corps du prince héritier de Xi Lei. Ce prince héritier, cependant, n'a pas le statut élevé auquel Feng Ming s'attend. Au lieu de cela, le prince régent Rong Tian détient le plus haut pouvoir à Xi Lei. Rong Tian remarque le changement soudain de comportement du prince héritier et l'habitude qu'a Feng Ming de prononcer des mots et des phrases modernes.

title.en: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

altTitles.ja: 女騎士とケモミミの子

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Kishi to Kemomimi no Ko

altTitles.ja: Female knight and the Kemonomimi child

altTitles.en: Female Knight and the Kemonomimi Child
The Female Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚。

title.en: Maou-sama no Mou Approach ga Overkill Sugimasu

altTitles.ja: 魔王様の猛アプローチが オーバーキルすぎます

description.en:
24-hour surveillance of ex-lover's activities.

A handsome demon king and an unlucky hero from a previous life.

Despite his bad luck, Yuuki Yuta lives an ordinary life. One day, a handsome transfer student, Mazaki Rei, arrives at Yuta's school. Although it should be their first meeting, Rei's sense of distance from the very first day is a bit strange.

When Yuta asks him why, he learns that Rei is the Demon King and that Yuta was a former hero in his previous life, And they were even lovers...!

Until Yuta's curse is lifted, he and the Demon King begin a 24-hour, indefinite life of surveillance!

A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Otokogirai No Onna No Ko Ga Saikyou No Sakyubasu Ni Narumade

altTitles.en: From a Man-Hating Girl to The Strongest Succubus

altTitles.ja: 男嫌いの女の子が最強のサキュバスになるまで

title.en: Omiai ni Sugoi Komyushou ga Kita

altTitles.ja: お見合いにすごいコミュ症が来た

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Really Can’t Communicate Showed up to My Marriage Meeting

altTitles.vi: ĐI XEM MẮT VỚI CÔ GÁI BỊ RỐI LOẠN GIAO TIẾP

description.en: Itami, a middle-aged businessman, registers with a marriage agency to find a marriage partner, but luck doesn't seem to be on his side when it comes to matchmaking. Unable to see him like this, his subordinate, Ms. Sonoda, introduces him to a friend.
description.ja: しがない中年サラリーマン・伊丹は、結婚相手を見つけるべく結婚相談所に登録するも、婚活は絶賛難航中。そんな彼を見かねてか、同じ部署の部下・園田さんが友達を紹介してくれるというが……。異色すぎる婚活コメディ！

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

description.en:
Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"
description.es-la: Cha Iseul es una chica que nació en cuna de oro. Dedicaba sus días a entregarse a los placeres de la bebida, el sexo y el despilfarro de dinero, hasta que su madre le quitó la tarjeta de crédito y decidió no darle ni un centavo más. En plena crisis conoce a Kang Sori, una chica de cabello despeinado y aspecto pasado de moda que parece ser todo lo contrario a ella...

description.ar: ميونغ وانغ اللقب الأعظم في مدينة تيانغ، من يحصده يحصل على القوة، الإحترام والمجد. بطل قصتنا الواعدة "شين وو جاي" الذي كان يعتبر أسطورة المدارس الإعدادية بالماضي في مهمة مستحيلة للإنتقام وحيدا من الأشخاص الذين غدروه و أهانوه.أعدائه ليسوا أي أشخاص،إنهم رفاقه السابقون الذين تدرجوا في سلم الجريمة ليصبحوا  بعدها سادة العالم السفلي بكوريا الجنوبية فهل سيكون "شين وو جاي" على قدر التحدي ليحقق انتقامه؟ أم سيكون قراره المتهور هذا غلطة عمره؟ أحداث نارية و حماسية تطرحها لنا مانهوا "high school gangsters" في الفصول المقبلة. تابعوا، ترقبوا واستمتعوا… بدأنا.
description.en:
A high school turf war entangled with betrayal, revenge, and remnants of friendship!  

The fierce clash between Shin Woo-jae and Yang Seon-tae, former friends turned enemies, becomes an intense battle over revenge and truth.  

Amidst the hierarchy of high school dominance, friendship and vengeance emerge.  

Who will claim the throne in the end?

altTitles.ja: あくまでクジャクの話です。

altTitles.en: It's just a story about peacocks.

description.en:
Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...! 

This is a biological comedy that confronts you with the brutal truth!
description.es-la:
Kuji Yakurou es un profesor que fue engañado y abandonado por su novia debido a su "falta de masculinidad". ¿No debería el mundo estar libre de género? Está angustiado, y luego Akano, una modelo, influencer, triunfadora y jefa del departamento de biología, aparece ante él y le pide que sea el asesor del departamento de biología. Luego comienza a explicar por qué la "masculinidad" es necesaria para ser popular después de todo, ¡usando las extravagantes plumas de un pavo real como ejemplo de "biología"...!

¡Esta es una comedia biológica que te enfrenta a la brutal verdad!

description.en: The protagonist, Okada, is in his mid-twenties and works part-time for a building cleaning company. He lives his life feeling anxious and dissatisfied with his unremarkable days. What will he do when he can’t think of anything to get a fresh start?

The manga's story teases of a boy who thinks everything in the world is worthless: the heroes who pretend to fight with grace, his classmates who only know how to flock together, and his own weak, miserable self. That is why the boy aspires to be the lonely, solitary, and ultimate villain, to change himself and the world.
description.pt-br: A história do mangá provoca a narrativa de um garoto que acredita que tudo no mundo é inútil: os heróis que fingem lutar com graça, seus colegas de classe que só sabem agir em bando e seu próprio eu fraco e miserável. É por isso que o garoto aspira ser o vilão solitário, isolado e supremo, para mudar a si mesmo e ao mundo.

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

description.en:
A world where only those with innate talent can become adventurers who conquer dungeons.
The world defined "Nagi" as a porter who cannot become an adventurer.

But if you clear a dungeon, doesn't that make you an adventurer?

Combat skills: 0! Survival abilities: Max level!
The dungeon conquest story of the all-purpose porter, Nagi, defying fate!

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Let's stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか！乞うご期待！

title.en: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.ja: 本物のカノジョにしたくなるまで、私で試していいよ。

altTitles.ja-ro: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitaku Naru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.en: Try Me Until You Choose Me as Your Real Girlfriend

description.en:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought he’d follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin!

Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はおるすばん妹の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту сестры-домоседки

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

description.en:
The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
description.pt-br:
O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá.

title.en: I'm the Hero, But the Demon Lord's Also Me

altTitles.en: I Am the Hero, and the Demon King Is Also Me

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku ga Yuusha de Maou mo Boku de

altTitles.ja: ボクが勇者で魔王もボクで, ボクが勇者で 魔王もボクで

description.en:
The story will combine the legend of a demon king with a hero who crosses over time and other things. The comedy will involve traveling between a Japanese living room and another world.  
  


---

[Alternative raw](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/42960)
description.ja:
時空とかいろいろ越えた勇者×魔王の伝説がここに!!
異世界⇔お茶の間ぐだぐだコメディ開幕！

津狩優真は平凡な高校生。下町の銭湯の息子として平和な日々を送る……ハズだったのだが、ある日突然異世界から来訪者が現れて――。美少女たちの猛アプローチに、優真はいったいどうなってしまうのか!?

description.en:
Wahhaman is a special robot soldier built ten thousand years ago by the Atlanteans. Found and dug up in present-day Tokyo, 
he doesn't remember anything due to a nasty knock to the head he received at some point.

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I Started Streaming in Another World, I Ended Up Creating a Large Number of Yandere Followers

description.en: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.
description.pt-br: Vivendo em Ataraxia, um mundo de espadas e magia, um indivíduo reencarnado decidiu ganhar a vida com streaming. Vivendo em um mundo onde tal coisa não existia, apesar das muitas formas de entretenimento, ele rapidamente fez um nome para si mesmo. Esta não é a história de apenas um streamer... mas de um garoto que se torna uma lenda como um haishinsha.

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

Starts with the story of a scientist kidnapped by Martians to help them with their experiments. The second story, [Rocket King,](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series.html?id=156880) is a gag one-shot about a professor and a young boy traveling through Egypt when they stumble across a mystery.

---
**Volume 339 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
description.ru: Корабль с Кеничи и доктором Бутоном тонет во время шторма. Они прыгают в самолет, который приходит им на помощь, но это оказывается ловушкой марсиан, которые хотят завоевать Землю используя доктора Бутона.
